703630f-a.title: Brooklyn: Clermont Avenue - Willoughby Avenue
703630f-a.text:
Clermont Ave., at the S.E. corner of Willoughby Ave., showing Simpson
Methodist Episcopal Church.
July 22, 1934.
P. L. Sperr.
703630f-a.folder: Clermont Avenue & Willoughby Avenue, Brooklyn, NY

707361f-a.title: Brooklyn: Willoughby Ave. - Clermont Ave.
707361f-a.text:
Willoughby Avenue, east from Clermont Avenue, showing a
group of remaining brownstone houses in this former fashionable
Fort Greene Park district. On the right is a portion of the
Simpson Methodist Episcopal Church and in the background, on
the corner of Clinton Avenue, is an old private mansion.
View 2 shows a closeup of the mansion, which was erected
after 1893.
P. L. Sperr  October 12, 1940
NO REPRODUCTIONS  Views 1,2
707361f-a.folder: Willoughby Ave. & Clermont Ave., Brooklyn, NY
